name: Lesa Pendergraph

text: Went there and ordered 1 beer 1st beer of the day. And ordered pizza. While I was waiting on my pizza I ordered beer #2. I was told that this is not a bar and I can't have another beer. So we now order our $50.00 -$75.00 worth of pizza at lupis pizza. The best pizza ever. Thanks for helping me find the real pizza place.
